item.title: Container Layer Analyzer
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: Today I’d like to point out an amazing new tool: The Container Layer Analyzer, written by Dan Čermák. Dan also wrote a comprehensive blog post about it, which explains it much better than what I do here.
